Text.Page:
Have you been out to the craters yet? The gods did that when the giants got too big for their giant britches.

But what's even more amazing are the diggers and boregolems that survived the Day of Fire. My theory is they dug themselves in, really deep. They can dig like anything.

If I had me some of those arms of theirs, our work would be cut in half, and in half again! I don't suppose you'd like to help?
Look at these! We can throw away our shovels now, and really start to dig!
I'm going to need a lot of those digger and boregolem arms. I'm telling you, I'm going to revolutionize excavation.
